title: Riot release the reset dates please.
body: Does anyone actually know the date when ranked will get reset and if not why will riot not release the date that they will be giving us our provisional matches?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Riot Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=xAr0LgUp,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-01-11T23:06:23.396+0000)
>
> Soon™ =P

Every time I see this it pisses me off!
I was gonna trademark soon for my new company...
I doubt they will ever tell us.
I think it will be sometime this week. The patch needs to be implemented soon so it can ready for LCS, which begins in 12 days.
And then we have to wait for it in NA time anyway like with everything else :P
LCS stats on the 24th, right? I'm thinking sometime next week, so, maybe 18th to 24th? Not sure.

The "[Welcome the New Season Sale](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/prepare-2015-season-kickoff-sale)" starts on the 23rd.

My guess is either 14th/15th OR 21st/22nd patch 5.1 comes out and the resets happen then.
